name: elevationpath

params.description: options for function call.
params.name: options

params.description: API key for services call (isocurve and autocomplete services). The key "calcul" is used by default.
params.name: options.apiKey

params.description: specify if control should be actived at startup. Default is false.
params.name: options.active

params.description: use of ssl or not (default true, service requested using https protocol)
params.name: options.ssl

params.description: Specify if button "Export" is displayed. For the use of the options of the "Export" control, see {@link ol.control.Export}
params.name: options.export

params.description: elevation path service options. See {@link http://ignf.github.io/geoportal-access-lib/latest/jsdoc/module-Services.html#~getAltitude Gp.Services.getAltitude()} for available options
params.name: options.elevationOptions

params.description: Layer informations to be displayed in LayerSwitcher widget (only if a LayerSwitcher is also added to the map)
params.name: options.layerDescription

params.description: Layer title to be displayed in LayerSwitcher
params.name: options.layerDescription.title

params.description: Layer description to be displayed in LayerSwitcher
params.name: options.layerDescription.description

params.description: styles management
params.name: options.stylesOptions

params.description: styles management of marker displayed on map when the user follows the elevation path. Specified with an {@link https://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/module-ol_style_Image-ImageStyle.html ol.style.Image} subclass object
params.name: options.stylesOptions.marker

params.description: styles used when drawing. Specified with following properties.
params.name: options.stylesOptions.draw

params.description: Style for mouse pointer when drawing the line. Specified with an {@link https://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/module-ol_style_Image-ImageStyle.html ol.style.Image} subclass object.
params.name: options.stylesOptions.draw.pointer

params.description: Line Style when drawing. Specified with an {@link https://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/module-ol_style_Stroke-Stroke.html ol.style.Stroke} object.
params.name: options.stylesOptions.draw.start

params.description: Line Style when finished drawing. Specified with an {@link https://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/module-ol_style_Stroke-Stroke.html ol.style.Stroke} object.
params.name: options.stylesOptions.draw.finish

params.description: profile options.
params.name: options.displayProfileOptions

params.description: display the total distance of the path
params.name: options.displayProfileOptions.totalDistance

params.description: display the greater slope into the graph
params.name: options.displayProfileOptions.greaterSlope

params.description: display the mean slope into the graph
params.name: options.displayProfileOptions.meanSlope

params.description: display the ascending elevation into the graph
params.name: options.displayProfileOptions.ascendingElevation

params.description: display the descending elevation into the graph
params.name: options.displayProfileOptions.descendingElevation

params.description: display current slope value on profile mouseover
params.name: options.displayProfileOptions.currentSlope

params.description: function to display profile if you want to cutomise it. By default, ([DISPLAY_PROFILE_BY_DEFAULT()](./ol.control.ElevationPath.html#.DISPLAY_PROFILE_BY_DEFAULT)) is used. Helper functions to use with D3 ([DISPLAY_PROFILE_LIB_D3()](./ol.control.ElevationPath.html#.DISPLAY_PROFILE_LIB_D3)) or AmCharts ([DISPLAY_PROFILE_LIB_AMCHARTS()](./ol.control.ElevationPath.html#.DISPLAY_PROFILE_LIB_AMCHARTS)) frameworks are also provided. You may also provide your own function.
params.name: options.displayProfileOptions.apply

params.description: DOM container to use to display the profile.
params.name: options.displayProfileOptions.target
